page.title: 05Daily life in Sparkwell.
page.content: On Saturday the 1st of June I got up got dressed and ate my breakfast. Then I went to gymnastics. We had to be there by 9.30 a.m. When we got there we started to do our exercises, then we practised for a display. My friend and I had to help some of the little ones. I stayed for another session but my sister didn't. I went on the beam with my two friends Sarah and Vicky. We had to do forward rolls and jumps on it. Then I went on the floor. I did my floor routine twice. After gymnastics we went to the seaside. We found a place to sit on the rocks. The tide was coming in. My two sisters Victoria and Ilsa and Mummy swam but Daddy and I didn't because it was too cold. Then we went home. Emily Elford.
